publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-130 Marlyn Glen: Congratulations on Montrose’s Blue Flag Award—That the Parliament congratulates Montrose on winning the coveted international Blue Flag for the condition of its beach, water quality and cleanliness; acknowledges the work of the community and Angus Council towards achieving this distinction, and notes with great satisfaction that the latest awards represent the best-ever results for Scotland in the scheme.
S3M-130 Congratulations on Montrose’s Blue Flag Award (lodged on 6 June 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*

S3M-130 Marlyn Glen: Congratulations on Montrose’s Blue Flag Award—That the Parliament congratulates Montrose on winning the coveted international Blue Flag for the condition of its beach, water quality and cleanliness; acknowledges the work of the community and Angus Council towards achieving this distinction, and notes with great satisfaction that the latest awards represent the best-ever results for Scotland in the scheme. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick
